story.text: DETROIT Jan 3 Nissan North America (7201.T) on Wednesday said U.S. December sales rose 4.4 percent, driven by demand for its Altima, Sentra and Versa cars. Nissan sold 91,775 vehicles in the United States in December, up from 91,523 vehicles a year earlier. Sales at Nissan Division were up 4.2 percent while the Infiniti unit was up almost 6 percent.
story.title: nissan north america december sales up 4 . 4 pct
